summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to Land Use and Zoning; amending Plat 41W, Page 112 of the Official Land Use to rezone property located at 23rd Avenue and Cherry Street from Lowrise 1 (L-1) to Neighborhood Commercial 1 with a 30 foot height limit \>(NC1-30') Zone and accepting a Property Use and Development Agreement in connection therewith. (Petition of Bruce McCrory; C.F. 295297).
